text: A lovely little boutique style resort on the water. Small restaurant with ocean views, as is the more than adequately sized swimming pool. Extremely clean and fresh looking rooms and decor and like in the majority of Bali staff go above and beyond and nothing is too much trouble. We are really enjoying our stay here.
title: 3 night stay

text:
Excellent hotel. Great location. Fantastic staff. Stayed for 11 nights and couldn't have had a more relaxing holiday. Tried snorkeling for the first time ever, right beside the hotel, and within 10 minutes saw a Green Sea Turtle as well as many beautifully coloured fish. On another occasion while eating our lunch in the restaurant we watched a turtle dive and resurface for over an hour. Just amazing. 
The rooms were cleaned every day. The pool was a good size and beds were always available. The food in the restaurant was great...and so was the Bintang. The best thing however was the staff. Especially Kadek, Putu, Molar, Komang and Ninga who we got to know quite well. Lovely people intent on ensuring we had the best time. Thank you for this.
title: Amazing

text: This is what I dreamt of , look for long time. Its a beautiful resort with Bali bungalows steps from the waves most awesome view ever have. Have fish swimming around in the garden, great outdoor bathroom, seclude sitting place with Bali art closer to Shangri La hard to get. Staff always friendly smile, most food very good- promise be back soon
title: One of the most beautiful and peacefull resorts ever been

text: Currently staying at Alam Candi. Beautiful seaside small quiet resort. The rooms are renovated and done beautifully. Little balcony and open bathroom. The place is clean and staff very friendly. Putu and Kadek were our servers for the five days and did a great job 😊. The food was delicious 😋. We took one of the Balinese boats out one day to snorkel over at turtle island. Took 10 mins. The fish were amazing. All sorts of colours, so clean no rubbish at all. Then to white sand beach (virgin breach). Also did a day trip to village and water palace. Candidasa is a 2hr drive from Kuta. There are a few spa places. Me and my friends went to Andre spa about 10min. The girls were amazing. Definitely recommend.
title: Bali getaway

owner_response.text:
Dear TracyK170

Greetings from Alam Candi and thank you for your lovely review of our resort.  We are so glad to read that you enjoyed our rooms, amenities and particularly the service of our wonderful staff.  Candidasa is certainly a wonderful spot in East Bali to base yourselves to experience all that the Island has to offer.  We too love the ocean and the sea life you can experience straight off of our property..and yes, White Sand Beach is truly glorious.  

We will be sure to pass on your kind feedback to our staff and we look forward to welcoming you back to our resort in the not too distant future.

warm regards

Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The resort is very relaxing. Staff are very helpful and friendly. They speak English very well. Initially we booked for 8 nights and on the last day we extend 2 more days. This place is so relaxing away from the busy crowd. You hear magical sou d of the waves. The restaurant offers very good food and drinks too. We will be back.
title: Little piece of heaven

owner_response.text:
Dear U4426J3

Greetings from Alam Candi Dive Resort.  Thank you so very much for taking the time to provide such a pleasant review of our resort and our wonderful staff.

The setting of our restaurant, Dasa by the Sea, is certainly spectacular and soothing at the same time.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your food and beverages.

One of the highest compliments we can receive is when our guests enjoy the surroundings and service so much that they extend their stay!

thank you again and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon.

kindest regards

Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I love the sound of the waves, so powerful yet soothing all day long- i could not move away from the day bed. our best weekend at Alam Candi - the hotel and restaurant are cleverly designed with a touch of blue everywhere, refreshing. the service were excellent,  the staff set a special table for dinner specially for us, food were nicely presented. the staffs from the restaurant; both day shift and evening one so genuinely friendly. absolutely love it.
title: Little jewel in East Bali

owner_response.text:
Dear 49 yoke

warmest greetings from Alam Candi.  we thank you for taking the time to provide such a lovely review of our boutique resort on the East Coast of Bali.  You certainly captured the essence of our property; we also love the sound of the ocean gently lapping against our wall and what better way to enjoy that serenity than to have a specially set table for your dinner.  Our staff pride themselves on providing our guests with an unique Candidasa experience and will be thrilled to hear that you appreciated their service and friendliness.

we look forward to welcoming you back to our Jewel in the not too distant future.

with thanks

Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stayed here last night with a friend (who lives in Bali) and together we had a delightul experience at this hotel. The room, the staff and the food all contributed to the perfect one night stay. The meals were definely outstanding. The hotel chef, Lanang Kastawa, prepared the most delicious seafood mimpang for dinner for us with the perfect combination of flavours. And lunch The next day was more of the same exquisite flavours. Earlier, we had been asked if we would like to reserve some mackerel for lunch which had just been caught.
Lanang had once again prepared the fish in a way I would expect to find in a top class restaurant at home (in Sydney). If you have a chance to visit Candidasa, do try and stay here, and if you aren’t able to stay at Alam Candi Beach Resort then come and eat at the restaurant. Lanang Kastawa’s cooking is sensational.
title: Ms

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms

warm greetings from Alam Candi Resort.  we would like to take this opportunity to thank you for taking the time to provide such a glowing review.

Your feedback in regards to the culinary skills of our chef, Lanang is very pleasing and we will be sure to pass on to the team.

we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

warm regards

Management
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Recently renovated and reopened. Great rooms, perfect restaurant with incredible food on the beachfront, a beautiful pool to laze around in and tie this in with brilliant staff who could ask for more in a resort.
title: Excellent Resort

owner_response.text:
Dear O5260ZWjohnp,

Warm greetings from Alam Candi Dive Resort!!

Thank you for writing a nice review, we are glad that you enjoyed the nature and our service. We are looking forward to welcoming you again :)

Warm regards,

Alam Candi Dive Resort family
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: rooms small  but beautifully furnished   can snorkel straight from restaurant pool  restaurant nice location found only has a small all day  menu the chef did cooked a couple of nice fish dishes  would have liked  a cocktail happy hour or maybe they should have a barbecue like Alam kulkul
title: small boutique hidden gem

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
A treasure hidden in the sleepy village of CandiDasa. A most beautiful quiet resort on the beach with spectacular views of Eastern Bali.  Super quiet with magnificent villas. A small resort with only 12 separate villas.  Breakfast daily and lunch and dinner available.
Wonderful staff who are always happy to help. A short walk to the main road with more restaurants and little market shops. A wonderful place to relax and enjoy another area of Bali out of the hustle and bustle of Kuta. Villas are beautifully fitted out with a superb outdoors shower. Note there is no Tv's in the villas, so take a good book with you. Beautifully set out villas with excellent house keeping, fantastic service and good value.
title: Absolutely Wonderful

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This small boutique hidden gem is exactly what we were after for a relaxing break away. The 12 accomodation huts were immaculate and clean with an outdoor shower / bathroom and air conditioning in the room was all we needed. Pool area is small but the relaxed atmosphere made it special. It was not busy when we were there so we had the whole place to ourselves.. the chef was amazing and cooked us all special meals off the menu as the menu was very limited and something they are working on at the moment. Staff were all very friendly and couldn’t do enough for us. If you are after an intimate time away with a loved one this is the spot or better still get 12 friends together and book the whole place how good would that be !!
title: Boutique beauty

owner_response.text:

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I really would prefer to keep this fabulous boutique hotel a secret so I’ll always be able to book a bungalow on my holidays. But they deserve all the bookings that will come their way when word gets out. Formerly the Alam Asmara Dive Resort, Alam Candi has had a makeover and has only been open for several weeks. 

With just twelve bungalows, it offers a personal yet discreet service to guests with some of the best staff I’ve ever encountered anywhere in the world- including some of Bali’s 5 star resorts in the south. The bungalows are a delight with fresh bright linens, comfortable bed, a spotless outdoor bathroom and comfortable porch to sit outside. 

The contemporary seafront restaurant/ bar offers a perfect view of the islands just off Candidasa no matter whether you’re having breakfast, lunch, dinner or simply a couple of evening drinks before heading out to the restaurants located close by. Currently, the all day menu is small but our meals here were delicious with a range of local and western dishes to choose from. And, as commented by a previous reviewer, the coffee here is excellent. 

We were able to arrange a great tour of Karangasem, lunch at Bali Asli restaurant and snorkelling at Blue Lagoon very easily with advice from staff who also assisted us to hire some snorkelling gear for use in the lagoon fronting the hotel. This was my travel buddy’s first visit to Bali and everyone at Alam Candi made her trip very memorable in the best possible way. 

So, Matur Suksma, Alam Candi. You have impressed me immensely and I will certainly skip the south of Bali to spend my holidays with you in the future.
title: Perfect

text: Recent renovations have made for a picture-perfect spot on the waterfront. Cozy rooms, tasteful decor, and a pleasing menu. Not to mention some of the best coffee of my life. This place is worth a visit if you're in the area!

user_location.name: New York, New York, United States
